says: What can I assist you with today?

reply.question: I need help figuring out which course I need

says: To ensure you get the assistance you need, I'll refer you to a representative who can help you as soon as possible. Our office is open from 8:30-5:30 from Monday-Friday.
To send an email to a representative, click here.
If you would like to restart the conversation, reload the chat using the reload button in the upper right corner, or reload the page.
